original_text: After his return from the defeat of Chedorlaomer and the kings who were with him, the king of Sodom went out to meet him at the Valley of Shaveh (that is, the King's Valley).
korean_text: 아브람이 그돌라오멜과 그와 함께 한 왕들을 쳐부수고 돌아올 때에 소돔 왕이 사웨 골짜기 곧 왕의 골짜기로 나와 그를 영접하였고

sentences.original_text: After his return from the defeat of Chedorlaomer
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그돌라오멜을 패배시킨 후 돌아왔을 때

sentences.original_text: and the kings who were with him
the king of Sodom went out to meet him
